fields.name: Die Hard
fields.description: Classic action thriller directed by John McTiernan. On Christmas Eve, New York cop John McClane (Bruce Willis) is visiting his estranged wife Holly (Bonnie Bedelia) in Los Angeles, where she works. They are attending a party at Holly's high-rise office block when terrorists, led by the suave Hans Gruber (Alan Rickman) break in, taking everyone hostage. With time running out, McClane is forced to got to extreme lengths to try and save the day.
fields.actors: Bruce Willis, Alan Rickman, Bonnie Bedelia

fields.name: Die Hard 2
fields.description: Classic action 1990's action, John McClane attempts to avert disaster as rogue military operatives seize control of Dulles International Airport in Washington, D.C.
fields.actors: Bruce Willis, William Atherton, Bonnie Bedelia

fields.name: IT
fields.description: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.
fields.actors: Bill Skarsg√•rd, Jaeden Martell, Finn Wolfhard

fields.name: Candyman
fields.description: The Candyman, a murderous soul with a hook for a hand, is accidentally summoned to reality by a skeptic grad student researching the monster's myth.
fields.actors: Virginia Madsen, Xander Berkeley, Tony Todd

fields.name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
fields.description: A world-class playboy and part-time secret agent from the 1960s emerges after thirty years in a cryogenic state to battle with his nemesis Dr. Evil.
fields.actors: Mike Myers, Elizabeth Hurley, Michael York

fields.name: The Mask
fields.description: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.
fields.actors: Jim Carrey, Cameron Diaz, Peter Riegert

fields.name: Armageddon
fields.description: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas will impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.
fields.actors: Bruce Willis, Billy Bob Thornton, Ben Affleck

fields.name: Jurassic Park
fields.description: A pragmatic paleontologist touring an almost complete theme park on an island in Central America is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
fields.actors: Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum

fields.name: Catch me if you can
fields.description: Barely 21 yet, Frank is a skilled forger who has passed as a doctor, lawyer and pilot. FBI agent Carl becomes obsessed with tracking down the con man, who only revels in the pursuit.
fields.actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Tom Hanks, Christopher Walken

fields.name: The Social Network
fields.description: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea, and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.
fields.actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Andrew Garfield, Justin Timberlake

fields.name: Glass
fields.description: Security guard David Dunn uses his supernatural abilities to track Kevin Wendell Crumb, a disturbed man who has twenty-four personalities.
fields.actors: James McAvoy, Bruce Willis, Samuel L. Jackson

fields.name: Passengers
fields.description: A malfunction in a sleeping pod on a spacecraft traveling to a distant colony planet wakes one passenger 90 years early.
fields.actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Chris Pratt, Michael Sheen

fields.name: High School Musical
fields.description: A popular high-school athlete and an academically-gifted girl get roles in the school musical and develop a friendship that threatens East High's social order.
fields.actors: Zac Efron, Vanessa Hudgens, Ashley Tisdale

fields.name: Home Alone
fields.description: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.
fields.actors: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci, Daniel Stern

fields.name: Cruella
fields.description: A live-action prequel feature film following a young Cruella de Vil.
fields.actors: Emma Stone, Emma Thompson, Joel Fry

fields.name: Wonder Park
fields.description: The imagination of a wildly creative girl comes alive in an amusement park.
fields.actors: Sofia Mali, Jennifer Garner, Ken Hudson Campbell

fields.name: Back to the Future
fields.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.
fields.actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson

fields.name: Goosebumps
fields.description: A teenager teams up with the daughter of young adult horror author R. L. Stine after the writer's imaginary demons are set free on the town of Madison, Delaware.
fields.actors: Jack Black, Dylan Minnette, Odeya Rush
